    <h2>CMS Medicaid Information Technology Architecture (MITA) 4.0</h2>
    <p>
        The MITA State Self-Assessment (SS-A) guides your State Medicaid Agency (SMA) to describe current operations and plan for future improvements. The SS-A helps align your Medicaid Enterprise System (MES) with CMS and State prioritized outcomes, MITAâ€™s capabilities (ORBIT), and Federal requirements for enhanced funding.
    </p>
    <h3>The SS-A Plays</h3>
    <ol>
        <li>Align MITA to your Medicaid enterprise</li>
        <li>Prepare your team to complete the SS-A</li>
        <li>Focus on the capabilities that drive your goals</li>

        <li>Connect the capabilities to your MES modules</li>
        <li>Envision the ideal state of your MES modules</li>
